data.value: 1. When you stare into the abyss, the abyss stares back at you.
2. To protect the world from devastation! To unite all peoples within our nation! To denounce the evils of truth and love! To extend our reach to the stars above!
3. We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.

5. As much money and life as you could want! The two things most human beings would choose above all â€” the trouble is, humans do have a knack of choosing precisely those things that are worst for them.
6. Have you any idea how much tyrants fear the people they oppress? All of them realize that one day, amongst their many victims, there is sure to be one that rises against them and strikes back!
